rooms.description: Main living area with eco-friendly materials and large glass openings towards the central courtyard for natural light.
Modern kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances and water-saving fixtures. Positioned in the south-east corner to adhere to Vastu principles.
Spacious bedroom with private balcony overlooking the courtyard. Decorated with natural materials and optimized for energy conservation.
Second bedroom with a spacious balcony ensuring privacy and direct access to the courtyard. Adheres to eco-friendly design principles.
Third bedroom designed with ample natural light, featuring a private balcony and energy-efficient fixtures.
Adjacent to the living room with an opening towards the courtyard for fresh air circulation.
Ensuite bathroom in Bedroom_1. Utilizes water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly tiles.

openings.description: Main entrance door on the south side with energy-efficient design.
Large glass windows facing east for maximum morning sunlight and natural ventilation.
Private balcony with green space elements and sustainable railing design.
Spacious balcony overlooking the central courtyard for relaxation and natural cooling.
Balcony integrated with the bedroom to promote well-being through nature connection.

central_courtyard.description: A serene courtyard featuring native plants, water features, and natural stone paths for eco-friendly design and improved air circulation.
